content.text: Match ends, Arsenal 2, Chelsea 2.
Second Half ends, Arsenal 2, Chelsea 2.
Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box.
Attempt saved. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by César Azpilicueta with a through ball.
Goal!  Arsenal 2, Chelsea 2. Héctor Bellerín (Arsenal) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner.
Attempt blocked. Alexis Sánchez (Arsenal) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Rob Holding (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Offside, Arsenal. Shkodran Mustafi tries a through ball, but Theo Walcott is caught offside.
Thibaut Courtois (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt blocked. Shkodran Mustafi (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Arsenal. Theo Walcott replaces Calum Chambers.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Andreas Christensen.
Attempt missed. Héctor Bellerín (Arsenal) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high.
Goal!  Arsenal 1, Chelsea 2. Marcos Alonso (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Davide Zappacosta with a cross.
Substitution, Chelsea. Willian replaces Eden Hazard.
Calum Chambers (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).

Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball following a fast break.
Goal!  Arsenal 1, Chelsea 1. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the centre of the goal.
Mesut Özil (Arsenal) is shown the yellow card.
